shows.overview: A brilliant but ethically flexible defense attorney navigates LA’s justice system.

shows.overview: A survivalist helps solve missing persons cases across the U.S.

shows.name: Brilliant Minds
shows.overview: A neurologist with face blindness leads a team solving psychological mysteries.

shows.name: Watson

shows.overview: A high school teacher in Austin tries to balance the competing demands of the students and their parents in a world where the rules seem to change every day.

shows.name: Shifting Gears
shows.overview: A widowed car shop owner adjusts to life with his estranged daughter and grandkids.

shows.overview: Companion show with behind-the-scenes content and interviews.

shows.overview: Companion series to All Stars, offering behind-the-scenes drama.

shows.name: This Hour Has 22 Minutes
shows.overview: Canadian satirical news show blending sketch comedy and current events.

shows.name: RuPaul's Drag Race
shows.overview: Drag queens compete in fashion, performance, and lip-sync challenges to be crowned America's next drag superstar.

shows.name: RuPaul's Drag Race UK
shows.overview: RuPaul has made the trip across the pond in search of a queen with the most charisma, uniqueness, nerve and talent in all the land.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.airDate: A hot new cast of queens enter the werk room as RuPaul kicks off his legendary race. Joel Dommett joins Michelle Visage and Alan Carr on the judging panel.

episodes.name: True Crime
episodes.airDate: Charles, Oliver, and Mabel bond over true crime podcast after Tim Kono's suspicious death; start their own podcast while investigating clues.

episodes.name: Who Is Tim Kono?
episodes.airDate: Trio attends Tim's memorial, searches his apartment; Mabel reveals childhood connection to Tim and past mysteries.

episodes.name: How Well Do You Know Your Neighbors?
episodes.airDate: Suspect Howard after cat paw prints in blood; Oliver secures sponsorship; threats emerge including poisoned dog.

episodes.name: The Sting
episodes.airDate: Suspect Sting after consulting podcast host; Charles dates Jan; link jewelry to Oliver's son.

episodes.name: Twist
episodes.airDate: Mabel reunites with old friend Oscar; track victim's final days to tattoo parlor.

episodes.name: To Protect and Serve
episodes.airDate: Oscar and Mabel connect; Detective aids with phone; Teddy pays from suspicious account.

episodes.name: The Boy from 6B
episodes.airDate: Discover Dimas family crimes; Theo kidnaps Oliver and Mabel.

episodes.name: Fan Fiction
episodes.airDate: Accuse Dimases publicly; autopsy reveals poisoning, clearing them.

episodes.name: Double Time
episodes.airDate: Retract accusation; suspect secret girlfriend; find bassoon clue.

episodes.name: Open and Shut
episodes.airDate: Reveal Jan as killer; arrest her; discover Bunny's body.

episodes.name: Persons of Interest
episodes.airDate: Arrested for Bunny's murder; new podcast; find suspicious painting.

episodes.name: Framed
episodes.airDate: Painting fake; parrot knows killer's name.

episodes.name: The Last Day of Bunny Folger
episodes.airDate: Flashbacks to Bunny's last day; suspect Nina Lin.

episodes.name: Here's Looking at You
episodes.airDate: Explore secret tunnels; Lucy warns of danger.

episodes.name: The Tell
episodes.airDate: Suspect Alice; learn Bunny's diner meeting.

episodes.name: Performance Review
episodes.airDate: Glitter bomb fails; Mabel attacked, framed on video.

episodes.name: Flipping the Pieces
episodes.airDate: Flashbacks to Mabel's past; subway attack, blackout.

episodes.name: Hello, Darkness
episodes.airDate: Race to save Lucy; suspect Kreps after glitter clue.

episodes.name: Sparring Partners
episodes.airDate: Confront Kreps; reveal Rose Cooper connection.

episodes.name: I Know Who Did It
episodes.airDate: Expose Becky as killer at reveal party.

107113.overview: Season three finds Charles, Oliver & Mabel investigating a murder behind the scenes of a Broadway show. Ben Glenroy is a Hollywood action star whose Broadway debut is cut short by his untimely death. Aided by co-star Loretta Durkin, our trio embarks on their toughest case yet, all while director Oliver desperately attempts to put his show back together. Curtain up!

episodes.name: The Show Must...
episodes.airDate: Ben collapses on stage, revives, then falls dead from elevator.

episodes.name: The Beat Goes On
episodes.airDate: Kidnapped by fan; restart podcast on Ben's murder.

episodes.name: Grab Your Hankies
episodes.airDate: Investigate handkerchief; footage from Ben's dressing room.

episodes.name: The White Room
episodes.airDate: Suspect Kimber; Charles proposes to Joy accidentally.

episodes.name: Ah, Love!
episodes.airDate: Loretta's secret fight with Ben; Joy breaks up with Charles.

episodes.name: Ghost Light
episodes.airDate: Ghost in theater; trio argues over investigation.

episodes.name: CoBro
episodes.airDate: Suspect Dickie; Mabel starts solo podcast.

episodes.name: Sitzprobe
episodes.airDate: Loretta confesses to save Dickie; Oliver has heart attack.

episodes.name: Thirty
episodes.airDate: Recreate timeline; suspect Donna and Cliff.

episodes.name: Opening Night
episodes.airDate: Expose Donna and Cliff; Sazz shot in Charles's apartment.

107113.overview: After their beloved doorman, Lester, dies under suspicious circumstances, Charles, Oliver, and Mabel refuse to believe it was an accident. Their investigation plunges them into the shadowy corners of New York and beyond - where the trio uncovers a dangerous web of secrets connecting powerful billionaires, old-school mobsters, and the mysterious residents of the Arconia. The trio discovers a deeper divide between their storied city they thought they knew and the new New York evolving around them - one where the old mob fights to hold on as newer, even more dangerous players emerge.

episodes.name: Once Upon a Time in the West
episodes.airDate: Trio to LA for movie deal; discover Sazz murdered.

episodes.name: Gates of Heaven
episodes.airDate: Investigate west side residents; find Oh Hell code and ham radio.

episodes.name: Two for the Road
episodes.airDate: Pair with actors Eugene, Zach, Eva; contact via ham radio.

episodes.name: The Stunt Man
episodes.airDate: Delve into stunt world; encounter familiar-faced suspect.

episodes.name: Adaptation
episodes.airDate: Face off against deceptive Hollywood cast and crew.

episodes.name: Blow-Up
episodes.airDate: Documentary by The Brothers Sisters reveals clues.

episodes.name: Valley of the Dolls
episodes.airDate: Flee to safe house; family refuge proves unsafe.

episodes.name: Lifeboat
episodes.airDate: Epic showdown with Westies alongside film actors.

episodes.name: Escape From Planet Klongo
episodes.airDate: Infiltrate film set for Sazz murder background.

episodes.name: My Best Friend's Wedding
episodes.airDate: Reveal final answers amid mortal danger and Arconia wedding.

107113.overview: After their beloved doorman, Lester, dies under suspicious circumstances, Charles, Oliver, and Mabel refuse to believe it was an accident. Their investigation plunges them into the shadowy corners of New York and beyond - where the trio uncovers a dangerous web of secrets connecting powerful billionaires, old-school mobsters, and the mysterious residents of the Arconia.

episodes.name: Nail in the Coffin
episodes.airDate: Investigating Lester's death lures trio out of Manhattan into dangerous territory.

episodes.name: After You
episodes.airDate: Flashback to Lester's early days at Arconia, sacrificing future for building secrets.

episodes.name: Rigor
episodes.airDate: Stumble on crucial evidence but compromise it; scramble before police close in.

episodes.name: Dirty Birds
episodes.airDate: Snooping caught by billionaire suspects; invited to Oliver's for evening.

episodes.name: Tongue Tied
episodes.airDate: Thwarted podcast plans; seek help from staff; Charles dines with suspect.

episodes.name: Flatbush
episodes.airDate: Investigation takes Oliver and Loretta to childhood streets; break-in leads.

episodes.name: Silver Alert
episodes.airDate: Mayor warns of billionaires; investigate upstate lair; Oliver's escape attempt.

episodes.name: Cuckoo Chicks
episodes.airDate: Mabel crashes ladies night; Charles and Oliver in couples therapy accidentally.

episodes.name: LESTR
episodes.airDate: Told through annoying robot's lens; Arconia party reveals killer may remain.

episodes.name: The House Always
episodes.airDate: Trio rushes to solve amid life-threatening peril.

episodes.name: Emperor Dead
episodes.airDate: Amid a growing constitutional crisis, the staff scrambles to stage an impromptu inauguration, while Hal exploits the chaos behind the scenes.

episodes.name: Last Dance at the Country Club
episodes.airDate: Kate weighs a compelling offer. Eidra faces scrutiny over fallout from the Roylin debacle. Stuart pitches a proposal that goes far deeper than policy.

episodes.name: The Riderless Horse
episodes.airDate: As the nation pauses to mourn, Grace considers the framework of her administration. Private strain threatens Kate and Hal's polished public image.

episodes.name: Arden
episodes.airDate: Kate's unique role grants her access to anyone she wants — except the one person she needs. Dennison puts actionable intelligence to personal use.

episodes.name: Birdwatchers
episodes.airDate: Forced to play the perfect couple, Kate and Hal confront a looming problem in international waters and a development that could torpedo U.S. credibility.

episodes.name: Amagansett
episodes.airDate: At an emergency strategy session, Grace weighs unthinkable choices, while Kate rolls the dice on a gamble that could alter the course of history.

episodes.name: PNG
episodes.airDate: Sequestered inside Winfield House as embassies go on alert and allies fall silent, Kate and Callum race to contain a potential disaster.

episodes.name: Schrodinger's Wife (Season Finale)
episodes.airDate: Kate must use all her leverage and political instincts to avert a catastrophe at a high-stakes summit — with the fate of nations hanging in the balance.

episodes.name: Pawns
episodes.airDate: September 16, 2025
episodes.desc: While working tirelessly to shield her family from the Game Maker's threats, another crime drags Morgan back into his game and the LAPD must decide whether to trust her instincts before the next move turns fatal.

episodes.name: Checkmate
episodes.airDate: September 23, 2025
episodes.desc: As the Major Crimes team desperately seek answers amidst a string of unresolved crimes, Morgan suspects the Game Maker is responsible. Meanwhile, Daphne and Oz set out to find Roman, and Elliot prepares a surprise act for his school’s talent show.

episodes.name: Checkmate
episodes.airDate: As the Major Crimes team desperately seek answers amidst a string of unresolved crimes, Morgan suspects the Game Maker is responsible. Meanwhile, Daphne and Oz set out to find Roman, and Elliot prepares a surprise act for his school’s talent show.

episodes.name: How Well Do You Know Your Neighbors?
episodes.airDate: Oliver employs his theater director skills to analyze the case. Charles & Mabel question an obsessive cat lover.

episodes.name: The Sting
episodes.airDate: Believing the murderer might be a famous resident whom is difficult to access, the group seeks advice from a renowned podcasting host.

episodes.name: Twist
episodes.airDate: Mabel slips away on a solo mission tracking the victim's final days. Suspicious, Charles & Oliver follow her.

episodes.name: To Protect and Serve
episodes.airDate: Mabel brings her new friends (and an old one) to her childhood home to meet her mother. Meanwhile, Detective Williams starts to have her own doubts about the case as she prepares for motherhood.

episodes.name: The Boy from 6B
episodes.airDate: With the investigation scratching at a web of old crimes originating inside the building, a mysterious young man turns the tables to spy on Charles, Oliver & Mabel.

episodes.name: Covid in America
episodes.airDate: Evan pushes back against the students as they try to modernize the school play.

movies.name: The Naked Gun (2025)
movies.overview: Only one man has the particular set of skills... to lead Police Squad and save the world: Lt. Frank Drebin Jr.

movies.name: The Conjuring: Last Rites (2025)
movies.overview: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren take on one last terrifying case involving mysterious entities they must confront.

movies.name: M3GAN 2.0 (2025)
movies.overview: After the underlying tech for M3GAN is stolen and misused by a powerful defense contractor to create a military-grade weapon known as Amelia, M3GAN's creator Gemma realizes that the only option is to resurrect M3GAN and give her a few upgrades, making her faster, stronger, and more lethal.

movies.name: Freakier Friday (2025)
movies.overview: Years after Tess and Anna endured an identity crisis, Anna now has a daughter of her own and a soon-to-be stepdaughter. As they navigate the myriad challenges that come when two families merge, Tess and Anna discover lightning might indeed strike twice.

movies.name: The Woman in Cabin 10 (2025)
movies.overview: On a lavish yacht for an assignment, a journalist sees a passenger go overboard. But when no one believes her, she risks her life to uncover the truth.

movies.name: TRON: Ares (2025)
movies.overview: A highly sophisticated Program called Ares is sent from the digital world into the real world on a dangerous mission, marking humankind's first encounter with A.I. beings.
